actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Gore attack and two Hooves attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage + 13 (3d8) radiant.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Distracting Glow (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Its horns flare brightly for a moment distracting its enemies. Each hostile creature within 60' of it and can see its horns: DC 15 Wis save or entranced by it until start of blestsessebe's next turn. Entranced creature has disadvantage on attacks vs. creatures other than blestsessebe.

actions.name: Hastening Stomp (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Rears and stomps sending small magical shockwave. For 1 min each friendly creature within 60' of it increases its speed by 10 ft. and can use Free Runner bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Blur of Motion
special_abilities.desc: When it moves 30'+ on its turn ranged attack rolls vs. it have disadvantage until start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
special_abilities.desc: Ignores difficult terrain and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. Can spend 5 ft. of move to escape nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 30'+ straight toward a creature and then hits it with gore on the same turn target: DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone blestsessebe can make one hooves attack vs. it as a bonus action.
